CustomProfile.Description: America’s Army Arcade transforms the U.S. Army’s recruitment tool into an arcade light‑gun shooter. Developed with U.S. Army leaders, the game recreates recruit‑training exercises through interactive missions. Players tackle courses such as the Point Man obstacle course, Shoot House, Shotgun Training and Sniper Course while a drill sergeant explains objectives and authentic training videos play. Adaptive difficulty rewards precision and teamwork, and a leaderboard encourages repeat play.
